website_summaries.verdict: Affordable, keyless security without additional door hardware. However, its reliability is occasionally questioned by owners.
pros: It has a solid feel and secure lock mechanism
no additional drilling needed for hardware to fit the door
Electronic lock typically withstands rainy weather
cons: compartments are somewhat small, and backup battery’s positioning is awkward
A few users report unit failure after 3 to 6 months

customer_reviews.title: Locks you out when it breaks, forever...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this unit for some time now, and it just "stopped working". Fresh batteries, and no audio from the lock when I pushed the code. Took it apart and checked all the connections, but no response. I had to climb thru a dangerous window to get inside the room the door was locking, as there's no other way to get in. Hoping the vendor contacts me with a replacement, otherwse don't buy this, unless you want to end up where I ended up, trapped outside the room I was locking.....
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lydick

customer_reviews.title: Secure knob with amazing battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item at the end of 2017. It started doing the Fast Beeping thing after a few months. I think that means the batteries are getting low. I decided to just keep using it until it died. It's been over 2 years later and it's still going strong. This is installed on a door in our basement and it gets used many times per day. The only complaint is the knob is a bit larger than a normal knob and it's smooth so it can be hard to open if you have something in your hands, if you have small or weak hands, etc. Other than that, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Excellent quality for the price. Easy to use and install. The only annoyance is that while you can have up to 10 different codes per knob, they have to go in numerical order. For example, the first code has to start with a 1, second code with a 2 and so forth. Other than that, these are perfect for keeping people/children out of spaces they don’t need to access.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Kuchenbrod

customer_reviews.title: Office door lock
customer_reviews.text: I have a office off my garage, I put this on the door so it can stay secured when I am not around and leave the garage door open. was easy to install and program. So far it has been working for a few months without any problems. I did get some good batteries to put in it and didn't use the ones that came with it. Also, the battery compartment holds 4 batteries. It will need to be removed from the handle and there are 2 separate doors where 2 batteries go.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I like the lock for it's price (half a c-note)
customer_reviews.text: I like the lock for it's price (half a c-note). It's visually not offensive for internal knob replacement to kiddy proof places like basement door. However I would not recommend using this lock for any point where real security is needed. It's cheap and has it's usage (like low-sec/baby proofing) but for apartment/house entrance door I highly recommend to spend more for a schlage product which I had.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love with these locks because I purchased 2 gold ones ...
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with these locks because I purchased 2 gold ones in November. They work like a charm; however, the silver ones were inferior. One did not work. Had to uninstall it after locking myself out the room. The second one will not allow you to reset the master code. You have to enter codes in twice to get the door open. Had to use it because my Airbnb guest were arriving that day. I would like to return the second too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie E. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 2 weeks then it would not accept ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 2 weeks then it would not accept any codes. Lights were on but nothing worked. No way to reset the master code because the button to reset was inside the locked room. This was installed on a faculty restroom in a school and there was no other access to this room other that through the door with the keypad. I had to use a pipe wrench to twist the knob past the stops and open the door.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Kawaguchi

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock but I have had to replace two already. The lock looks and functions great -- until it doesn't. I haven't found another lock that will fit on my door that provides a combination lock. The first unit I bought didn't work at all. The second one worked but went bad after a month. I am now on my third and it is currently working. I am hoping it was just bad luck. Amazon gave me a credit when I returned the non-functioning units and I bought the units again.
customer_reviews.author: NorhLoudspeaker

customer_reviews.title: Lock digits lighting up but not unlocking
customer_reviews.text: This lock has stopped working within 6 months of purchase. The keypad is lighting up and beeping tones as digits are punched in but not giving the long beep for unlocking. We had to go through the attic to go into the locked room to open it from inside. Changed batteries but same behavior. Seller, can you help with this recent purchase?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: Junk. If The batteries die( which you have to take the whole thing apart to replace the batteries ) the door is unlocked! Unsafe
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. Holds up well this far.
customer_reviews.text: Very please with this product. Was very sceptical on the quality for the price point. This is rainy season where I live and I have installed this on a garage door in full path of the daily rains. It has held up for 3 weeks of hot sun and daily rain storms. So far not a single complaint. Even decided to beat the handle up a little and yank on the door. I'm not a small man and it took all the abuse I dealt it (besides being an animal towards it that is). Will edit this if something happens in the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D.

customer_reviews.title: Door lock failed in less than one month.
customer_reviews.text: Put this lock on a vacation rental. It failed. There is no override if something goes wrong, have a backup plan. The exterior fit and finish is nice but once you open it up you will see how cheaply made it really is.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda L Payne

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This knob was easy enough to install and worked well for 9 months. The other day I went to my shop where it is installed and tried to get in. The buttons pressed and made noise but the mechanism would not engage. I tried the battery backup but when I pulled the plug on the bottom water poured out. We had to break into the shop since this was the only door. May work fine as an interior door but cannot recommend it to anyone for use outside unless it will be very protected.
customer_reviews.author: Brain Leg

customer_reviews.title: PITA knob
customer_reviews.text: Works well for about 10 days then you have to take it apart and redo the code Does it if its cold or warm out. You may want to look elsewhere for a knob like this one
customer_reviews.author: Poutine-boy

customer_reviews.title: They worked fine, until............
customer_reviews.text: I have 20 of these locks and have been using then for almost 3 years. In the last 3 weeks I have had two of my renters actually stuck INSIDE their rooms because the doorknobs would not release the deadbolt and allow it to open. Thankfully they were able to disassemble the lock body from the screw side and remove the deadbolt by bending it. This failute hy two seperare units will steer me away from this product. A shame really because most of them work fine but I cannot take the chance that this will happen on a consistent basis.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Defective item received
customer_reviews.text: Did not work right out of the box I tried batteries they supplied and that I purchased
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: We ended up returning
customer_reviews.text: We ended up returning this as we didn't like some of the features. We did not like the way it would have acted if the batteries had died. Getting in the room would have been difficult.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: This seems like a good purchase so far.
customer_reviews.text: Only had this lock installed for about a week. It seems like a good device. It has pretty good options, especially for when someone may be watching and you don't want them to know the correct code. It lets you enter a bogus group of numbers part way into entering the code and can follow what you are doing, as long as you end with the right digits. I'm giving 5 stars because, if it holds up, it will be warranted. I'll revise my review if this turns out to be a problem product.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality !!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work right out of the box. It would get power with the external battery pack but not from the batteries inside of the door knob.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Navarro

customer_reviews.title: I like these but have 2 complaints
customer_reviews.text: I like these but have 2 complaints. 1. Although it will allow both the Master and alternate codes, for some reason it forgets the alternate codes periodically for no reason at all. This makes the alternate codes basically useless! Major Flaw! 2. Although it looks fine, It is very large and clunky to handle. We put one on our bedroom door and it is awkward opening, I have to be careful not to hit my knuckles on the door jam.
customer_reviews.author: LoveOnlineShopping

customer_reviews.title: Directions are wrong
customer_reviews.text: First one I bought in 2017, just died, but we loved it so, I'll try one final time. The directions say after the master code, wait until the green light goes out and the blue light remains on. This is wrong, you need to enter the new master code while the green light is on. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Inglis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install if you need to replace an older ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install if you need to replace an older lock. Installation instructions could be a bit more clear. When I installed the batteries inside the lock by mistake I only installed 2 batteries but only afterward I noticed that the battery compartment is on both sides! So you actually need to install 4 AAA batteries. So I had to dismantle the lock again to get to the battery pack to install the other 2. Other than this little mistep the lock works perfectly.!.
customer_reviews.author: W.P. Born

customer_reviews.title: Our 3rd one’n
customer_reviews.text: I love these door locks. This is our 3rd one. The first two we bought for each of the kids rooms and for out room we planned to put a barometric lock. We tried 2 different fancy expensive ones... both of which we sent back and decided just to get the same one the kids have. Highly reccomended!
customer_reviews.author: Jessiefly

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk
customer_reviews.text: These are really complete garbage. Spend a few more bucks and get a quality lock. Got tired of my two not working and donated them to charity. Somebody else's problem now.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Great combo lock
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased about six of these for three different houses over the last few years. They work great, just replace the batteries about once a year. No issues with buttons wearing and showing code numbers. The manufacturer continues to tweak and make slight design improvements every few years.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 Autistic children so we use these on the bathroom doors and my bedroom door. They are fairly simple to install, and fairly quick to set up, although the instructions are kinda hard to follow. They peep when you hit the buttons, and it’s kinda noisy, but not loud enough to wake up my babies. I would definitely recommend getting these in order to make any door 100% baby proof!!!
customer_reviews.author: shonna

customer_reviews.title: A must have with bad kids
customer_reviews.text: Have a daughter that is above the law in her eyes and has no boundaries. She can no longer steal moms clothes without us knowing. Sad it’s come down to this but it works!
customer_reviews.author: PA Lineman

customer_reviews.title: 18 Month Lifespan
customer_reviews.text: This door lock worked great... for 18 months. Then, half of the buttons stopped working. Replacing the batteries didn’t help. The door is located in a long covered breezeway and sunlight nor rain ever hits it. We live in a low humidity location (San Jose, CA). The cost of this door lock is greatly diminished if you have to buy a new one every 18 months. I browsed through the reviews and this is quite common, so don’t say I didn’t warn you.
customer_reviews.author: Blane

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I love this door knob. I want one for every door in my house. We were looking at coded knobs for a while, and we're so happy with this one. The only thing I wish was a feature is having an actual "unlock" switch. This you have to enter a code every time you shut the door, which security wise is great, but bringing in groceries isn't. This has awesome code options, one time use codes and all different possibilities with codes. The only negative was that you can't have two codes start with the same number, that was kind of annoying but ultimately not a big deal. I would absolutely buy this again, and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Winpisinger

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: The first lock I received did not work. I was disappointed until the seller contacted me and offered to do whatever to resolve the situation. Due to their great attitude and customer support I am giving their lock another try. Will edit to include durability and battery life once I install the lock. The lock is installed and working. Upgraded to five stars .
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Bulky but good
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product - the battery casing that goes into the knob is subpar quality and that's being generous. The knob itself is kinda big and bulky so be sure to measure and know your area well. For example, I can't use my right have to open it from the outside of my house because my knuckles run into the jam and it just won't work. Overall satisfied, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy8

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: We now have three of these. My daughter lines to lock her room and feel like she has privacy so I installed this with her as a "user" code and I have the master. She doesn't even know I can get in there in an emergency and she still has pace of mind knowing her brother can't steal her electronics. I installed one on our pantry door after finding empty bags of marshmallows and chocolate chips in the kids rooms and now that issue is over. Easy install and programming. If you can read that is. Also installed one on my bedroom door, No more kids swiping stuff out of my room.
customer_reviews.author: DOITLAYNSTYLE

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your home
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best it's investments I made, I will by more, works great, easy to install, easy to set up codes, I love it.... I use it on my bedroom to keep my sneaky, nosey kids out.... Lol. It actually gives us peace of mind cause it automatically locs itself, it also comes with a battery pack with small plug just incase you infnkr the low battery alarm and it goes dead, plugs in on the side under the key pad....
customer_reviews.author: Samanuche

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock in November of 2017 to keep people out of a personal bathroom, and the included batteries JUST ran out today! I have zero complaints. It even alerted me that the batteries were about to run out with a 5 beep warning after I input the code. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I got this product Jan 18 2018 but on Jan 2019 it stopped working. The keypad “0” is stuck and since it is the main used key the lock is gone. I tried to communicate with the seller “global cyber “ with no response. Next will try to contact amazon to remove this seller from the platform- DO NOT BUY THIS Product
customer_reviews.author: Hanoch Raviv

customer_reviews.title: Careful How You Receive This Product..
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, my low rating is geared more towards what i received.. Never got a chance to use the product itself, however, based on some reviews, it appears this item is sold without any quality check from time to time.. I actually received my item with corroded batteries, corroded battery pack, No Manual, and did not work after multiple solutions and testing with jump pack. I returned, and got a Schlage Touch Century for 89.00 and So Glad I Did.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Going strong since 2016 - and now I have 6!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased my first unit in 2016 for my home office door. Since then, I have purchased 6 more. My home is a triplex and I'm an Airbnb host so I need a quality, reliable, easy-to-use lock for my guests and housekeepers. Unlike others, I've never had the experience of the lock or battery failing. I give this product very high marks!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I I ordered this before from sohomill however they were out of stock so I ordered it from this company. Seems like the same lock just different branding. Only problem with this one is when I press the code fast it doesn’t work. Needs to be done at normal speed. This doesn’t happen with the other one
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, had to change the battery’s and then about ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, had to change the battery’s and then about 2weeks later was greeting g some guests and had to change out to regular keyed entry. It beeped but wouldn’t open?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Had it only four months, and it stops working. Battery was still charged, but neither my code or master code worked. Now I have to repair the door I kicked in.
customer_reviews.author: marcus

customer_reviews.title: Would like to try a good one that’s not defective
customer_reviews.text: It was great for about 2 weeks then started not opening. Was locked out on several occasions. Changed the batteries and worked great for another week untill it rained and then it just lit up all blue and buttons didn’t work at all. Been using a screw driver to release the latch for months now and decided to see if I could get a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: john viera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, design
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, design, and functionality! The main reason I went for this is to eliminate the risk of lock bumping - no keyhole. Other things I like (beside the above): 1. Up to 15-digit codes. 2. Passage mode. 3. Emergency battery backup. Couple this with a deadbolt and a door guard, I feel much better leaving the house. Oh, and the kids love it, too. They mastered it with a couple tries.
customer_reviews.author: Jacko

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend had some troubles installing this in my door but after he made some modifications it worked perfectly. Once installed it is so easy to use. Perfect peace of mind when you're living with roommates.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica EB

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 5 months...backlight still comes on but won't unlock. Tried brand new batteries as well as resetting the code but nothing worked. Had to take apart door jam to get into room.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: NO STARS...BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: No stars..i have purchased 3 of these and only 1 of them worked. I have wasted $100 on installation. There is no customer service phone number for this cmpany..I would not buy ANY PRODUCT they make.
customer_reviews.author: Aes

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product. Coding failed after first use. Reset at the battery did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Easy to install,. But after entering the code , per directions, the outside lock turned once but never again. I then, per directions, reset the code to default at the battery box. But it would not work. No matter what I did. Very frustrating. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... my bedroom because I always lock my door but hate having to bring the key with me all the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this installed in my bedroom because I always lock my door but hate having to bring the key with me all the time. The door locks itself everytime the door closes and I can just punch in key in like 2-secs where before with the key took me like 20-secs and very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tomk

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get any better than this!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought the mid-level kwikset keypad deadbolt (died after 3 years), the expensive schlage keypad deadbolt (my favorite deadbolt), and now this. For $50 dollars this is easily a similar quality to the schlage deadbolt. Very heavy in the hand and easy to install. I'll be buying more for my rental property.
customer_reviews.author: mikem

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, works great but, a bit loud...
customer_reviews.text: This package arrived on time and in great condition. It is hefty, solid and smooth. It looks great and is easy to set up. The YL-99 I received has no mute feature and the sound is a little too loud. I heard you can dampen the noise with some foam tape though. I am happy with the transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, surprisingly easy. They look really modern and feels nice when in use (when you turn it, and the give it has when you do) feels well made and have bought a few for my mom and myself (I live in the city, so when I have parties this prevents people from wandering everywhere but the bathroom lol) one critique: wish it was cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Renzo P.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love Door Knob!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one of the keyless units where the keypad was above the knob. Because of the window in our door it would not fit right. After looking for sometime I found this unit with the keypad right on the handle. We’ve had it for four years now and have never had a problem. Four people use it multiple times a day. Just had to replace the batteries for the first time today so it got me to thinking about leaving a review.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn NY

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: The door knob doesn't work at all. The buttons dont light up or work with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Rahz May

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I didn’t read the reviews before i purchased and after only three months the “0” stopped working and therefore I couldn’t get in. I was locked out for hours and ended up having to go through the screen of a window to get in the house. Big disappointment. And customer service has been terrible trying to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Much

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Stop working then charge the battery ! week later stop working and saw wire is broke. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Ovco Team Sport

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Real easy to install. Directions were slightly confusing but after a couple reads it was fine. I love the "someone watching security feature." The buttons on the handle is somewhat weird but not a big deal. I'm 6'2" and not too bad. Probably easier for short peeps.
customer_reviews.author: Patty B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: This Door lock looks good on the door, works very easily and serves the purpose of security without a key. I have had it for about one month and I love it. TH knob is a bit big and took a bit getting used to but beyond that, its excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Fayetteville GA

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this on for a couple of months now and it seems to be working just as we'd hoped. Installation was pretty easy. The price is much better than any you could buy in store.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: I really like this electronic door lock
customer_reviews.text: I really like this electronic door lock. It lights up at the touch of the button and is easy to use. I did however have a problem after a couple months of use. We would have to put the code in a few times before it would engage. I have to give this seller five stars for prompt response and taking care of the problem right away. I would recommend this product and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Hedden

customer_reviews.title: Love and Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this keyless entry lock! No more wasted time looking for the house key. No more getting locked out of the house! Got my son to install and give me an overview of how to enter the code; however instructions for the codes are very easy to follow and understand. One caution though, the actual buttons are quite small so if you have large fingers it may be a bit uncomfortable. Would love the option of gold plated!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Review

customer_reviews.title: Quality problem
customer_reviews.text: After about 2 to 3 months use the keypad went bad - digits 7, 8, *, 0 didnt work. Company/importer sent me a second unit. That didnt work either. Couldnt get the second replacement unit to accept passcode to enter. Spend hours on the first unit...and I finally got it to work. Second replacement unit I couldnt get to accept passcodes. Even after I was able to get the first unit to work. So its not that I didnt know how to program the codes. Now throwing both units in trash as Im pass the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It installed easily with no modifications
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this door lock as a way to convert our walk-in closet into a secure room to store things I didn't want other people to pilfer, such as kids, cleaning people, etc. Frankly, I was shocked at the level of quality of this unit. Very heavy feel, solid construction, flawless finish. It installed easily with no modifications. The back-lit numbers are bright, and once you read and understand how to set codes, it's easy enough. I like that the door knob turns when locked. I will be purchasing another soon.
customer_reviews.author: redjacket

customer_reviews.title: May have some problems
customer_reviews.text: The biggest problem is that the keypad becomes stiff and buttons refuse to press. It is being used outside, so it is receiving hot sun. How it would work in the interior is unknown, but I suspect better. Do like the easy install and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Nathine Goldenthal

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Will give 4 stars because instructions are terrible but i somehow managed to get it working correctly the first try n just over a half hr. I didnt replace the part of my old doorknob where the button slides into when closing and is just fine 😊
customer_reviews.author: Celene

customer_reviews.title: No more changing locks due to lost or stolen keys... Just change the code!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased (and personally installed) my first Signstek Lock in March 2017 for my rental unit and because it had worked so well, I had purchased another for the studio apartment. I had gotten a third in April 2018 for the cottage and then the fourth in Dec 2018 and they are all working fine. I like the fact that they are sturdy, easy to install and have stood the test of time. Also a very important fact to note, the battery consumption is minimal as the 4 AAA batteries lasted for over a year! If you don't wanna be changing locks every minute for lost or stolen keys, get yourself a Signstek Lock from Global Cyber Mart!
customer_reviews.author: Timmis

customer_reviews.title: Keypad failed within 1year
customer_reviews.text: This knob failed within 1 year and it was used on an exterior door that is in an overhang, so no direct weather. The keypad stopped working, and yes I tried new batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M Blecha

customer_reviews.title: easy to install sturdy lock for airbnb .. buy one !!
customer_reviews.text: im a landlord/airbnblord and this lock is marvelous it fit an odd sized door on a rental, it was constructed sturdy enough to be used in a prison! easy install, easy programming and the best part is that there was a screw hole in the back plate so when putting it together you didn't have to contort your screwdriver to get it to come together .. i got mine on a warehouse deal but ill likely buy a full priced one when i need another lock .. 5 stars all the way !!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great price
customer_reviews.text: We use these on all our office doors. They are easy, great to have multiple codes, and batteries last a long time (and give ample, ample warning before dying on you). Good product on the less expensive end of things. Have had no issues with multiple purchases over the last few years.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a reasonable product life span
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. I purchased (4) of these for our bedroom doors. Worked great for a while, then two of these just stopped accepting any code to open. Batteries were fine, they just wouldn't unlock. Luckily I was able to jimmy the lock open on both, but what a nightmare until I could get these doors open. Don't waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with quality and ease of setup
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use on our front door. House is contemporary in nature - and we bought it on a chance figuring we could always use it elsewhere if we didn't like the product once it arrived. With that said - could not be more pleased and would definitely recommend to others. We used this to replace an high-end OMNIA front door entry and our front door has never worked better. Finish is excellent and mechanism works flawlessly. The knob itself gives a very solid presence to visitors when they come to the front door. The setup instructions (for the digital codes) was easy and quick to accomplish. Great product and highly recommended to anyone considering purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Greene

customer_reviews.title: Solid product/very reliable/highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great batteries last a looong time. Very reliable product. Made converting to keyless easy. I bought for my second home as well highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Steven A.

customer_reviews.title: 1 star... this will lock you out ...
customer_reviews.text: The very first time using the emergency power pack and guess what.... the adapter doesn't fit. Pick a different product. This one will cost a fortune when it fails you.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Schiller

customer_reviews.title: Minor difficulty setting up but so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to complain about for the price. Have had two of these units for a week in commercial office setting. Once set up they work perfect. My only concern is the battery /circuit board compartment. If someone were to handle roughly without instructions it could be damaged. Do read the instructions and be gentle. Once the parts are installed correctly it's a pretty sturdy device.
customer_reviews.author: FSG MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I have had so many issues with this. It doesn’t work 80% of the time on the first try and I just had to break a $170 door down just to get into my room because it stopped working all together. Thanks a lot for a product that can’t deliver and costing me even more money.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Yohner

customer_reviews.title: Fine.
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation and works well. Backup battery doesn’t work so you have to replace batteries before it runs out. It will be a nightmare if you get locked out without your keys.
customer_reviews.author: co2smoke

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to program multiple codes, or enter an "alternate" code if someone is watching. Only thing I wish I could do is turn off the sound of the keypad.
customer_reviews.author: WJ Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install, great security
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this product for our church to provide some security for a side door that the Pastor only uses. It was really simple to install. It took just about 20 minutes to put together and program. I enjoy the backlight feature on this unit. I would recommend it to anyone. Just make sure you have 8 AAA batteries on hand for the door lock and emergency battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We love this...family of four boys. Easy to install (12 year old did it) and use. Only worry is to make sure I change batteries before they die. (Based on other reviews) easy to use and many options so you can get in and out quick. We lock the treat pantry up and a closet with electronics and nerf stuff or things we want to hide. Oldest son installed one on his bedroom to keep brothers out. We have our own code he can't change too so we are good to go in.
customer_reviews.author: MomoFour

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works as described
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works as described. The doorknobs are slightly bigger than normal indoor doorknobs. The only downside to the product is that the buttons do "beep" as you push down on them and makes a small buzz noise upon entering the correct code. However, this doesn't bother me. I have roommates and no one has complained about the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Savvystudent

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sturdy lock
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this for my bedroom door and it works perfect it also lights up when you touch the keys and you can assign several different PIN code just in case you don't want people to have the main pin. The price is compatible to those at Home Depot. I have the same lock on my front door and it has worked perfectly for five years.
customer_reviews.author: crystal c

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my third lock of the exact same thing....first one on my bedroom, second one on my garage door, third one I put it on my study/office room... the first one I had has been installed for 2 years and still haven't changed the battery yet.
customer_reviews.author: WY

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I've made on Amazon. Easy to install and easy to program. One thing I would remind installers is to make sure you put in the batteries correctly. I had one of the batteries reversed. It still provide the power to program but I was not able to get the door to turn to the open position. Fixed the issue once I installed the batteries correctly. It's working great so far. No more keys to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: captain tylor

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy this!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I did not know how cool and wonderful this door lock is. I read a couple of reviews that said that it was great, but I did not know it was going to be this great. The materials, the sturdiness that feeling of the buttons when you push them, the looks of the lock. Everything feels premium. It is a normal door lock, not a deadlock. And my only con would be that it needs 4 triple A batteries that are NOT included. Either way I recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible lock
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible lock. Failed within 2 weeks of installing. Completely locking us out. Had to call a locksmith. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer allpress

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well built. Easy to use. Real nice being able to give each kid in the family their own personal code. Love the party mode too where you can easily set it to open on any key press.
customer_reviews.author: D. Degner

customer_reviews.title: About average digital lock.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, was easy to install. You have an extra battery pack if the installed batteries go dead. I would really prefer a key. But its a great lock where the dead bolt lock is close to the door handle. I would say it took me less than 20 minutes to install it.
customer_reviews.author: resoh02

customer_reviews.title: Quick & easy to installl
customer_reviews.text: I installed on an interior closet to keep medications and cleaning supplies out of reach for children. Appears to be of great quality, was easy to install & program, and looks great! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SD Cincinnati

customer_reviews.title: broke at 30 days
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these on my gates at home. I love them. I ordered a new one for a third gate. The first thing I noticed was t he sound level was low while pushing the buttons. Then after only 2 weeks it quit working. I thought what cheap batteries. After checking them and found them not the problem. I hooked up the external power supply and it worked. Until yesterday when that no longer worked. Now at 31 days after purchase I am unable to return.
customer_reviews.author: kim lodge

customer_reviews.title: I like the positive security they provide by relocking themselves automatically ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and installed two of these units to replace keyed locksets on my outside storage room doors. Instructions were straight forward and was able to remove old units and install new within 30 minutes. Have used them on a daily bases for over a month without any problems. I like the positive security they provide by relocking themselves automatically within a few seconds of opening the door. It's also nice not to have to remember to have a key with you when working outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I put this on an outdoor gate exposed to the elements. It's been in use for a couple of months and is working very well - still looks brand new. It's a little complicated to program at first, but once you read the manual a couple of times you should get it. Very well made and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rick in SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Did not function.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work , I can program the knob but it does not actuate mechanically. The knob turns but never opens the door.
customer_reviews.author: Huntinghawk

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a keyless entry for a while. Found this one at a great price. We have several family members that need in our house often and somehow keys end up missing or lost. This way all they need is a code and if they forget it, it just takes a text or a phone call for them to get in my house to take care of fur babies. This knob fit perfect in the hole that was already from the standard doorknob we already had. Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F.

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, no power
customer_reviews.text: Could not get it to work. Assembled and installed, no power. Great concept if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it!
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing until it stopped working. The batteries were fine, the codes just stopped working. We eventually took a hammer to it (no other way to get in). Kind of scary how easily it broke off, 3 whacks and it broke off. Definitely dont waste your money, it will lock you out and it isn't very secure in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good value. I installed it in my garage door. I would always forget to lock or close the garage door. The lock auto locks so it's good for me. Working well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great but lasted 3-4 years
customer_reviews.text: Great, need to replace battery much more often than Schlage. And lasted only 3-4 years on gate outside
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Francois Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous waste of time!
customer_reviews.text: We are returning this product. We had nothing but problems with it. After programming for a torturous amount of time, we still couldn't get it to work. Watched a youtube and everything...Eventually, best we could make happen is that people could come in with ANY random single digit-- press "9" and you're in or press "7" and you're in-- What? Hours wasted on this thing. Hated it! Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: karen Hoge

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and works great.
customer_reviews.text: This item works great. Was easy to install and setup codes. For the price, this is well worth it. The numbers are a bit hard to see when standing above them but we've all likely hit that keypad layout so many times, it doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: have been using this for a couple months now and no complaints. was a little tight for kids when 1st installed but works great and very handy battery backup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly stopped working and locked me out of home
customer_reviews.text: This lock suddenly locked me out of home. I did charge using the charging port and tried my master pin and entry pin, but they both didn't work and I had to break in the door. Please help yourself and don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dileep Kumar Reddy

customer_reviews.title: easy to install: while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Really well made, easy to install, great price. Edit: while I loved it while it lasted after about a year the keypad stopped registering my combination. Being that it had no key to get in, in case of such a thing, I had to kick in the door to get inside of the room. While it looks and feels nice, having to kick in a door and fix the frame is kind of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Vladislav

product_meta.title: Signstek Electronic Keypad Door Knob Lock with Encryption Function, Silver
feature_bullets: Convenient for Keyless Entry: This digital lock provides 1 master code and 9 access codes. And you can set the password up to 15 digits, suitable for office, house and apartment.
Enhanced Security: Designed with encryption function, this doorknob can avoid the code being peeping.
Universal Fit: It fits most standard doors and the free rotating knob make it fit both left and right handed doors. With adjustable latch, it fits 2-3/8-Inch (60mm) or 2-3/4-Inch (70mm) backset.

Easy to install: Easily installs in minutes with just a screwdriver even you are not professional. The keypad is back-light that enable you to enter codes more convenient even in darkness. Note: It requires 4 batteries. Batteries are not included.

Multi-Functions: Comes with an emergency power supply in case that the batteries run out. Note: the lock only can stand drizzle but cannot stand heavy downpour. It is not suitable to expose to the area where is always rainy.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars660 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
